name: Astronium (Demo)
description:
What is Astronium?

Astronium is a RPG game focused on collecting powerful weapons over time. Each enemy has special drops that you can obtain ( EVERY SINGLE ONE).
You are going to control a astronaut who crash  landed on a strange planet, you need to search for a way out, but the island is full of factions and wild creatures.
Find allies, defeat bosses, and explore different biomes with unique creatures and weapons.

Key Features in this demo :
- 5 normal weapons
- 5 Special weapons with a unique power
- over 10000 pixels to explore
- Boss Fight with the Goblin Shaman
- Translated to English and Portuguese - Pt-BR The final version is yet to completed, but i'm working every day to get this finished this year.


WARNING - This demo still doesn't contain any type of music or sound, i'll be adding it on the future
Please tell me about any glitch or bug that is happening with your version. This demo launch is also a way to hear about your opinion in general and what to improve on for the final version, Thanks!
